title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info
text:
\function get-field(fname) [<plugin-full-path>get<fname>]
\define addInfo-actions()
<$action-setfield $index="title"       $value=<<plugin-full-path>>    />
<$action-setfield $index="version"     $value=<<get-field version>>   />
<$action-setfield $index="stability"   $value=<<get-field stability>> />
<$action-setfield $index="name"        $value=<<get-field name>>      />
<$action-setfield $index="description" $value=<<get-field description>> />
<$action-setfield $index="author"      $value=<<get-field author>>      />
<$action-setfield $index="source"      $value=<<get-field source>>      />
<$action-setfield $index="list"        $value=<<get-field list>>        />

<$action-setfield $index="plugin-priority" $value=<<get-field plugin-priority>> />
<$action-setfield $index="parent-plugin"   $value=<<get-field parent-plugin>>   />
<$action-setfield $index="dependents"      $value=<<get-field dependents>>      />
<$action-setfield $index="plugin-type"     $value=<<get-field plugin-draft>>    />
<$action-setfield $index="core-version"    $value={{{ [<plugin-full-path>get[core-version]] ~[<version>]}}} />
<$action-setfield $index="packaged-by"     $value=<<now "Gatha on DDth MMM YYYY, 0hh:0mm:0ss">>             />
\end


<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{!!caption}}
<$tiddler tiddler={{{ [<plugin-full-path>] [[plugin.info]] :and[join[/]] }}} >
<<addInfo-actions>>
<$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/><!-- open the plugin.info file -->
</$tiddler>
</$button>
caption: add plugin.info (for node.js)
